subject: Football
Concussions
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
lead_paragraph: Approval of the landmark deal, which was originally reached in August 2013 but revised twice, clears the way to end one of the most contentious legal battles in N.F.L. history.
snippet: Approval of the landmark deal, which was originally reached in August 2013 but revised twice, clears the way to end one of the most contentious legal battles in N.F.L. history.
